RunOnlyWhenLive.label: Only Run When Live
RunOnlyWhenLive.tooltip: Run the trivia minigame only when you are live.

PlayPermission.label: Permissions to Play
PlayPermission.tooltip: Set the permission level for participating in trivia

AdminPermission.label: Permissions to Modify
AdminPermission.tooltip: Set the permission level for adding, removing, modifying questions and other tasks

QuestionDelayInMinutes.label: Question Delay
QuestionDelayInMinutes.tooltip: Amount of time in minutes between questions.

QuestionString.label: Question Format
QuestionString.tooltip: How the trivia questions are displayed. Parameters: $index, $points, $currency, $game, $question, $answers

QuestionSuccessResponse.label: Successful Answer Format
QuestionSuccessResponse.tooltip: The string displayed on correct answer. Parameters: $index, $points, $currency, $game, $question, $answers, $user

ShowAnswersOnFailure.label: Show Answers on Question Expiry
ShowAnswersOnFailure.tooltip: Show the question's answer(s) when the question expires.

QuestionFailureResponse.value: Nobody answered the previous question. The answers were $answers.
QuestionFailureResponse.label: Failure to Answer Format
QuestionFailureResponse.tooltip: How the trivia answers are displayed on expiry. Parameters: $index, $points, $currency, $game, $question, $answers

QuestionsRewardLoyaltyPoints.label: Loyalty Point Rewards
QuestionsRewardLoyaltyPoints.tooltip: Correct trivia answers reward loyalty points.

QuestionDefaultPointValue.label: Default Question Values
QuestionDefaultPointValue.tooltip: The default point value a question will have if none is supplied.

RewardDecreaseOnAnswer.label: % Point Decrease On Correct Answer
RewardDecreaseOnAnswer.tooltip: Future currency reward amount will decrease by this percentage when somebody correctly answers a question. Lowers the value of easy questions.

RewardIncreaseOnNoAnswer.label: % Point Increase On Unanswered
RewardIncreaseOnNoAnswer.tooltip: Future currency reward amount will increase by this percentage when nobody correctly answers a question. Increases the value of hard questions.

EnableChatConfirmations.label: Enable Chat Confirmations
EnableChatConfirmations.tooltip: Enable or disable chat messages that confirm successful command usages.

EnableChatSyntaxHints.label: Enable Syntax Hints
EnableChatSyntaxHints.tooltip: Enable or disable syntax hints for when somebody uses a command improperly (Missing arguments, etc.).

EnableChatErrors.label: Enable Chat Errors
EnableChatErrors.tooltip: Enable or disable chat messages for command errors (Not A Number, Insufficient Permissions, etc.).
